mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_name, member_id, member_password, member_email, member_address1, member_address2, member_address3, member_address4, member_grade, enabled) values (#{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{add1}, #{add2}, #{add3}, #{add4}, 0, 1)
